attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to formally request that the proposed closure of weir hall library be stopped forthwith. This library, though not vey big, serves as a good reference library for some of us in Edmonton. It is also a study place for those who cannot go to the library at Edmonton Green. In addiion, it is not as "busy" as Edmonton Green library, therefore provides an ambience for serious study. It equally has facilities that evey library has especiallly for our kids when they are on holidays.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
